typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	File as string,
	Directory as string,
	ExecutionDate as timestamp,
	RunId as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> StructuredFile
StructuredFile derive(HASH = md5(columns()),
		ExecutionStatus = 'INSERT',
		ExecutionCreatedDate = $ExecutionDate,
		ExecutionModifiedDate = $ExecutionDate,
		ExecutionLogId = $RunId) ~> AddColumns
AddColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: []) ~> Current
